text: śikṣa avaruṭe mēl vannubhaviccappēāḷ avar paṟaññu: hē; mūsā, ninṟe rakṣitāv ninnēāṭ ceytiṭṭuḷḷa karār munnirtti ñaṅṅaḷkk vēṇṭi avanēāṭ nī prārt'thikkuka. ñaṅṅaḷil ninn ī śikṣa akaṟṟittarunna pakṣaṁ ñaṅṅaḷ ninne viśvasikkukayuṁ, isrāyīl santatikaḷe ninṟe kūṭe ñaṅṅaḷ ayaccu tarikayuṁ ceyyunnatāṇ‌; tīrcca
